steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Glide.
A grenade that unleashes bolts of Solar Light at nearby enemies.
Reduces the cooldown of Scorch. Killing enemies with Scorch causes them to explode.
While active, Radiance reduces all cooldowns for nearby allies.
Aiming your weapon while in the air will hold you in place for a short time.
Gain an additional grenade.
All grenades Ignite enemies, causing damage over time.
Enemies you Ignite burn longer and take more damage.
Increases the duration of Radiance.
Killing an enemy with Scorch has a chance to generate Orbs of Light.
Slam a target with a wave of force.
Reduces the cooldown of Scorch. Hitting enemies with Scorch knocks them back.
A powerful melee attack that Ignites enemies, causing damage over time.
Run faster.
Upgrades Glide to provide bonuses to both speed and control.
Upgrades Glide for better directional control while in the air.
A grenade that creates a flare of Solar Light which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
An explosive grenade that causes bonus damage when attached to its target.
Radiance can now be activated from beyond the grave. Doing so returns you to life. Radiance duration is reduced.
While active, Radiance reduces incoming damage.
Fill yourself with Solar Light, dramatically increasing the effectiveness of all your abilities.
Training focused on toughness and speed.
Upgrades Glide to provide an initial boost of speed.
Damaging an enemy with Scorch reduces incoming damage for a short time.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on toughness at all costs.
Training focused on all attributes.
